Visit <https://ropenspain.github.io/mapSpain/articles/working_imagery.html> for
learning how to download imagery of Spain.

Note also that you would need a bunch of extra packages. Make sure that you
install the packages needed running:

``` r
install.packages("mapSpain", dependencies = TRUE)
```
